text: RLC may refer to: ==Education== * Redeemer Lutheran College, Queensland, Australia * Rosseau Lake College, Ontario, Canada ==Engineering== * RLC circuit, resonant electronic circuit * Radio Link Control, air interface protocol ==Politics== * Republican Liberty Caucus, US political organization * Republican Leadership Council, a US political advocacy group ==Other uses== * Redfern Legal Centre, NSW, Australia * Revived Late Cornish, a variety of the Cornish language * Royal Logistic Corps of the British Army * Rugby League Conference, Britain * Ruben Loftus-Cheek, English footballer * Rlc., the abbreviation for Rhyncholaeliocattleya, a nothogenus of orchids
title: RLC
